message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do a bit better than that, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $120?
I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I think we can do better. How about we try $110?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a decent profit. How about we meet at $130?
I'm getting close, but I think we can do even better. How about we try $125?
You're really pushing me to get creative, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $140?
I'm really close, but I think we can get even closer. How about we try $135?
You're really testing my limits, Bob! I'm willing to make one final concession. How about we meet at $145?
I'm not willing to go above $135. I think that's the best we can do. Can you meet me there?
